Html: I have been wondering if there are any plans for a Resto Druid module for Rawr? I would offer to help but unfortunately my coding skills are nonexistent. If all it needs is time to learn this however that I have. So if you want to point me to a good place to learn how to write this I could try but, I just figured someone might already be working on it. Anyway thank you all for Rawr this tool is simply amazing and wonderful.

There are many resources to learn C# on the web, though I'm not familiar with any of them specifically... Give it a try, if you think you'd like to tackle making a resto model, let me know (no, none in development at the moment).

Thanks for the Quick and informative reply I am working with Microsoft visual C# 2008 express edition right now along with some online tutorials I found.

Looks like it will be awhile but I am going to try and learn this so hopefully tree's can have some loving.

Oh and Bear Hug
